summary:
-adds 5 Earrings for the left ear and 5 Earrings for the right ear
-male and female
-seperate meshes for Humans,DarkElfs,HighElfs,WoodElfs and Orcs
-Beast Races not supported (Khajiit,Argonian)
-followers will equip them
-both earrings can be enchanted
-3 different Materials available (Steel/Ebony/Gold)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Pierced Ears - Earrings [/size]

-adds 5 Earrings for the left ear and 5 Earrings for the right ear
-male and female
-Beast Races not supported (Khajiit,Argonian)
-seperate meshes for Humans,DarkElfs,HighElfs,WoodElfs and Orcs (105 meshes)
-positioned for Vanilla Head Meshes and Ear Morphs
-followers will equip them
-both earrings can be enchanted
-3 different Materials available (Steel/Ebony/Gold)

Have fun!
...and feel free to upload your Screenshots (as long as they are SFW)...


Video byÂ  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url] (nexus) / [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuOyXRkpN_S1Hyyt3kyRG7g]FeuerTin[/url] (Youtube)
[youtube]A2KESi_lkeI[/youtube]
more Videos:
[url=http://youtu.be/ItJuchUddI8]Another Skyrim Mod Feature #34[/url] by Nozi87
not really safe for work:
[url=http://youtu.be/pdGO3OJSoLg?t=12m55s]Skyrim Mod Review 39 - Series: Boobs and Lubes[/url] by VatiWah
[url=http://youtu.be/iJLv-jmQVnA?t=6m4s]Skyrim Mods - Week 158[/url] by MMOxReview

[size=4]Requirements:[/size]
-none (Skyrim)

[size=4]How to get:[/size]
[size=2]-craft them at the forge under Jewelry[/size]
[size=4]
Body Slots used:[/size]
Right Earrings use Slot 43
Left Earrings use Slot 44

[size=4]Optional downloads:[/size]
alternative Esps that change the left Earrings Body Slot Number to 55

[size=4]Install/Uninstall:[/size]
use NMM or MO

[size=4]Problems/Workarounds:[/size]
[size=2]If you use Racemenu: make sure all sliders that mention "Ear" are set to their default values
If you use ECE: not tested, not supported - but seems to work
If you use alternate Head Meshes: not supported

The left earring replaces a part of your armor or another item: go to optional Downloads and install the Alternative Body Slot Esp


[/size][size=4]Version:
[size=2]0.6 [/size][/size]
[size=4]
Permissions:[/size]
Do not upload my mod to other sites or Steam Workshop.
You can use my files in your mods (Followers/Shops etc), just provide proper credit and a link to the original mod.
You can reupload translated versions of my mod, just provide proper credit and a link to the original mod.



[size=4]Credits:
[/size]Bethesda for Skyrim

[size=4]Mods used in Screenshots[/size] (not all I'm afraid):

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53100/?]Gameplay Performance ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weather [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?]Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0 [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]

[size=4]Tools used:
[/size]
Blender
Niftools
Nifskope
Gimp 2.8
Creation Kit
TES5Edit
BSAopt
author: Nostromo79

files.name: PiercedEars - Steel
files.changelogHtml:
Version 0.6


-fixed wrong texture path for Newlyna World Model

-item values are now based on used materials

-added Standalone Ebony Earrings

-added Standalone Gold Plated Earrings

-added all-in-one version - all materials/earrings, only one esp+bsa (not compatible with other versions of the mod and you will lose all earrings crafted with earlier versions of the mod, won't happen again...)
